BBEX3.A.BIF.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Burundi / USD 1 = BIF ... (buying)
Source: Since September 2010: Banque de Credit de Bujumbura, Bujumbura. 1990 - August 2010: Banque de la Republique du Burundi, Bujumbura.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 1991: On 9 August 1991, the Burundi franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  8 August 1991: USD 1 = BIF 171.6329 / 173.3578  9 August 1991: USD 1 = BIF 201.3891 / 203.4131.  Calculated devaluation of the Burundi franc: 14.8%.
